item.title: A noob's guide to creating a personal website
item.description: So, you finally decide to build your own website. You fire up your favorite search engine and take a quick look around on how to do so and are bogged down by the number of options available. Some of those provide you ready made websites with awesome bells and whistles, but charge you copious amount of money. Others are more easy on your pocket but require skills that only a computer engineer possesses.
